website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a combination of some nice features as well as some concerns. But when it comes to looks, it's one of the best.
pros: A nice-looking watch with a slim design
Earns praise for its fast charging ability and long battery life
More than 40,000 pre-loaded courses around the world
Vivid screen is easy to read
cons: Some inaccuracies tracing various aspects of the game
Makes an annoying "buzzing" alarm that is difficult to turn off

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and accurate watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. It is accurate in telling distances to the green but also to hazards that are on the course. Do make sure that you update the watch with a computer though. You do not get the most recent update from syncing with the app. When you update on the computer it allows you to turn off all the vibrating/beeping functions that could happen during your swing. Also this app allows you to do some minimal fitness tracking. Once I had this update I fell in love with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Felt1623

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and read
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and read. Nice functionality BUT...Vibrates after every shot and no way to silence it (part of the shot tracking feature). Nice if you don't mind having a cow bell on the course. Sync software is flaky. does not maintain sync even after paining. Could have done better for the price. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost 10 months ago, I play almost every weekend. Battery barely makes it a full round, and last two months not even that. I took it out today after charging it to full and it died before I could even choose the course. Will never buy these again. Don't waste your money on it. Not even going to get into the poor app and website synchronization.
customer_reviews.author: Randy D.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest GPS to read and accuracy seems very good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read, comfortable and works well. Charging is quick and easy. Battery will last for the whole round and then some. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in Ripon

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Wristband is comfortable, GPS finding the course is much faster than previous version. I love the automatic stroke detection and ability to track the distance of strokes and summary of the round with the sync to the phone app. The step tracker is great but I wish it would also sync to the phone
customer_reviews.author: Alton Bell

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even work for one day
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t even give it a star. For $200 you’d expect the thing to work. Won’t stay on unless it is plugged in to a power source. Yah that’s real fn useless. Very disappointed. Will never purchase from this vender again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent golf watch, gives accurate distance measurements and is easy to manage and understand
customer_reviews.author: victor goomes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: All good. But the auto detection of a shot have room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Score works fine as long as you fix this immediately manually
customer_reviews.text: I wear it to course every time. Sometimes shots are not detected or you hit something it counts as a shot. Score works fine as long as you fix this immediately manually. Features are just adequate. It now tracks steps, calories etc.
customer_reviews.author: Odyssey77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, still getting used to all the features. Many thanks
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch/golf gps.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a golf gps that was not a handheld unit. I own two previous Garmin golf gps which work great but was a has to always retrieve from the bag or cart. I want a GPS watch and discovered the Tom Tom. This watch style GPS works great. It locates the satellite quickly and works like charm. The Tom Tom is easy to update and the phone app is wonderful to track all your rounds and swing/shot analysis. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bornzo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great golf gift for your dad since you already got him clubs, tees, shirts, balls...
customer_reviews.author: Jae K.

customer_reviews.title: It is OK sometimes hard to remember how to get ...
customer_reviews.text: It is OK sometimes hard to remember how to get to different screens. Also takes a while to recognize when hole is completed. Does record strokes OK
customer_reviews.author: Salman Aziz

customer_reviews.title: excellent distances to and past hazards
customer_reviews.text: accurate, excellent distances to and past hazards, 27 holes on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: charles f.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated at first but great. I had my 6 year old show me ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Complicated at first but great. I had my 6 year old show me how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Antillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my son-in-law. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gcamp

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate distance
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate distance Different 30~40 yards to Garming GPS. Garming GPS is same as laser finder. I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: seo

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few golf items that use GPS to determine yards, hazards, etc. This is by far the best of the bunch! First, it works well as just a watch. It's light-weight, battery lasts for about 2 weeks, looks nice and casual. It's easy to read and has the date also. In terms of golfing, it found my course quickly and is far more user friendly than other GPS items I have used. The score keeping feature is nice and puts it above the competition. Overall, I'm super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: R. Pickman

customer_reviews.title: So So  nothing to write home about, does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Its really no better than the TomTom Golfer, My golfer 2 stops recording shorts during the round, Reset, reloaded done it all and it just does not work as advertised! Wish it worked like it did the first few rounds but alas, not so! works for a few holes and then stops. have been emailing support and trying what they say for a couple weeks, there has been no offer from them to provide me with one that actually works. you may want to look at the others, and just go with the best price you can find and forget about short recording options or fantastic customer support
customer_reviews.author: unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Fits great. Very easy to read and distances have been extremely accurate thus far. I would probably give this watch 5 stars if I could turn off the ANNOYING buzzes! Does anyone know how to do this? If I take a practice swing or two and then address my ball...just as I start my back swing for my REAL shot, the freaking watch buzzes on my arm!!!!!!! I already went into the "options" menu and turned buzzes to "off" but it still happens. If anyone can help me troubleshoot this, I would gladly update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement died also
customer_reviews.text: I did like the features on this GPS watch, but after about 9 months, the battery totally died and to their credit Tom Tom sent a replacement. Now, another year later and the watch again died, with no way to recharge. Sorry, but I'll be searching for another mfg for my new GPS watch.
customer_reviews.author: John Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Recommend you get a screen protector for it if you are rough on watches like I am.
customer_reviews.author: Robert dickins

customer_reviews.title: PGA Technology on an Amazon budget
customer_reviews.text: Very imressive golf tool! I saw that Tom Tom had upped their game with this watch which not only tracks shots accurately, but also distances so you an improve your game. It;s is very simple to use and has a great app that tracks your shot statistics. If you're like me you don't have the PGA money but you CAN have the high tech that will help you improve your game You can't improve what you don't measure and this lets you do that easily. So strap one on and I'll see YOU on the greens..
customer_reviews.author: C. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic golf watch. It is comfortable and stylish. I am not a golfer so I have not visited many Golf courses, but I don't think there is a golf course in the US that is not on here. The watch is pretty accurate but I can't say it improved my game. However, for a pro golfer this is a very useful watch. It has a great stylish look and can fit a small or large wrist. I like this watch and hope my game can improve.
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money and user friendly on single ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the money and user friendly on single location courses. Had a problem with multiple course location. Warren Valley in Dearborn Hts has East and West Courses watch got confused and doubled the distances and counted them as one. Out on the course no distinction and could not correct the watch. Recommend this watch accurate yardage to front middle and back on normal single courses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tomtom Golfer 2 Gps Watch
feature_bullets: Smart shot detection; Automatically detects and records your shots to show your distance potential and gives insights about your game
Ultimate round; Creates a virtual summary of your best holes on a course you've played regularly; See your potential as you look at the best combination of holes you could have played
Automatic scorecard; Track your score without worrying about the pencil; Plus, your shots are recorded and categorized for postgame analysis
Pre-loaded with full course data of over 40,000 international golf courses
View unique green and hazard graphics before you take your shot; See precise distances to the front and back of individual hazards along with distances to the front, center and back of the green

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars67 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
